## sdf_to_avro

## Description
Convert column(s) to avro format 


## Usage
```r
sdf_to_avro(x, cols = colnames(x)) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An object coercible to a Spark DataFrame |
| cols | Subset of Columns to convert into avro format |
